@ ctang

you def have bragging rights.  you are one of the few dvd-r uploading masters here on TPB.

@ J

hello my friend!  this is a DVD5 so no recoding will be needed.  get yourself a 4.7 DVD-R, open a program such as nero (which i use to burn dvds), drag the completed DVD folder into the burning program and press "Burn" or whatever your program displays for you to burn this to the disc.  simple as that.  

of course that is a quick explanation of the process, i guess it might depend on what you use program wise.  i swear by nero 7 (old as shit but easy to use and straight forward).  you literally drag, click, wait, and then your done within 10 minutes.

hay is there any one on here that knows were i could get a clean copy of cce and dvd-rebuilder the last time i tried to download them i wound up with a crap load of viruses

w
a
r
e
z
-
b
b
.
o

g

1. register
2. do a search for both
3. download both
4. install both
5. Run DVD-RB
6. CCE Trial for the encoder, since cce will probably be a trial of 2.7 that you find, make sure you set DVD-RB to CCE Trial and make sure in the options that the cce path is correct
7. Make sure "one click mode isn't checked"
8. Prepare
9. Encode
10. Rebuild

there are other options you can work with if you have RB-Opt but you need a long tutorial to work with it and it can be complicated...good luck
